ruleData.rule:
package ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign;
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.Stat
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.StatValues
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.segment.ActionType
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.dokupi.CompareProcessing
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.processing2.SaleProcessing2
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.processing2.ProcessingResult
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.processing2.EventProcessing
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.processing2.NumValue
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.processing2.Operation
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.dokupi.DokupiResult
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.actions.PointsAction
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.actions.DiscountAction
import ru.ptr.ds.other.util.ActionUtils
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.mechanic.RuleTemplate
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.mechanic.TemplateField
import ru.ptr.pdp.data.sale.model.event.TriggerEvent
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.segment.SegmentData
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.deal.Sale
import ru.ptr.ds.data.campaign.deal.SaleWrap
import ru.ptr.ds.data.coupon.Coupon
import ru.ptr.ds.data.coupon.SaleCoupon
import java.math.BigDecimal
import java.util.Arrays
global ru.ptr.ds.service.processing.StatService statService;
global ru.ptr.ds.service.processing.ActionService actService;
global ru.ptr.ds.service.segment.SegmentDataService dataService;
global ru.ptr.ds.service.campaign.ParticipationService partService;
global ru.ptr.ds.service.processing.PointsService pointsService;
global ru.ptr.ds.service.processing.LoyaltyService loyaltyService;
global ru.ptr.ds.service.processing.UnionService unionService;
global java.util.List list;
rule "COUPONS_AVG_PURCHASE айди678"
lock-on-active true
agenda-group "COUPONS"
when
    a: CampaignDRL(campaignId: id == "айди678")
    tempSale: Sale(partService.isPerfectlyTimed(refund, date, a.startDate, a.endDate), customerUUID != null)
    partSale: SaleWrap()
    sale: Sale(saleId: id, customerId: customerUUID, sprocessing: is2()) from partService.filter(tempSale, campaignId, partSale.getParticipatingSale(campaignId))
    c: CampaignDRL(data: data, customerGroup: data.getCustomer().isActuallyParticipate()) from dataService.loadUp(a, customerId)
    CampaignDRL(coupons: mechanic.ruleData.templateVariable("coupons").stringValue) from c
    CampaignDRL(sum: mechanic.ruleData.templateVariable("sum").numericValue) from c
    result: ProcessingResult() from Operation.gte().name("main").l(sprocessing.cartSum()).r(NumValue.of("sum",sum)).evaluate() 
    CampaignDRL(type: mechanic.type) from c
    CampaignDRL(loyaltyType: mechanic.loyaltyType) from c
    CampaignDRL(dokupiType: mechanic.campaignSubtype) from c
    CampaignDRL(cumulative: mechanic.isCumulative) from c
then
    boolean ignore = false;
    int succ = 1;
    boolean isMain = true;
    ActResult act = new ActResult(Arrays.asList(new PointsAction(campaignId, customerId, saleId, type, ignore)
                .setStatValues(result)
                .setLimit(sum)
                .initializePoints(sale, BigDecimal.ZERO, succ)
), customerGroup);
    list.add(FireResult.builder().success(result.isSuccess())
            .action(act)
            .stat(new StatResult(new Stat(campaignId, customerId, result),
            sum, succ, isMain))
            .sale(sale).build());
end
